unnormalised: Crop insurance, crucial for farmers! Heard PM Fasal Bima Yojana payouts are slow in Bihar. Anyone facing delays after applying before 26/01/2023? My Kisaan credit card loan depends on it! Rs. 50,000 loss due to floods near Patna last monsoon. Need that claim by 10/10/2024, 17:00 hrs, or else chinta hogi. Heard SBI is involved, maybe talk to them directly like my uncle Ramlal suggested at 14:30 hrs yesterday? Hope it helps! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, crucial for farmers! Heard P M Fasal Bima Yojana payouts are slow in Bihar. Anyone facing delays after applying before twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three? My Kisaan credit card loan depends on it! Rupee fifty thousand loss due to floods near Patna last monsoon. Need that claim by tenth October two thousand and twenty four, seventeen zero zero hours, or else chinta hogi. Heard S B I is involved, maybe talk to them directly like my uncle Ramlal suggested at fourteen thirty hours yesterday? Hope it helps! Jai Kisan!
